reset_password.title: Forgotten password
reset_password.success: Your password has successfully been reset. Please do the first connection process in order to set your new password.
reset_password.successMail: An email allowing you to reset your password has been sent to you.
reset_password.userNotExist: The user corresponding to the information entered could not be found.
reset_password.cannotFindToken: Error, can not find your reset token.

first_connection.title: First connection
first_connection.success: Update done, you can now log in with your credentials.
first_connection.success_login: Update done, you are now log in !
first_connection.userNotExist: This user does not exist or has already been activated.
first_connection.alreadyHavePassword: Operation is not possible, this user already has a password.
first_connection.passwordNotValid: The password is not valid, please try again.

help.password_content:
Please choose your password, it must respect the following format:

- 8 characters minimum
- At least 1 digit
- At least 1 capital letter
- At least 1 special character (!@#$%^&*)

login.login_fail: The login and / or password is not correct, please try again.
login.not_enabled: Your account does not seem to be activated, please complete the first connection process.
login.logout_sucess: You have been successfully logged out.
login.wrong_captcha: The captcha entered is not correct, please try again.

settings.title: Access managment
settings.tool_success: The access configuration file has been imported.
settings.tool_warning: Warning, the file has to be the same structure of the current access.json file !

auth_component.no_access_group_module: Your group do not have access to this module.
auth_component.no_access_group_entity: Your group do not have access to this entity.
auth_component.no_access_change_status: Your group do not have access to change this status.
auth_component.no_access_role: Your role is not allowed to do this action on this entity.
auth_component.no_group: Your account does not have access to the application, please contact the administrator.

db_tool.title: DB Tool
db_tool.import_success: The import has been successfully completed.
db_tool.import_error: An error has occurred, please check the logs.
db_tool.wrong_dialect: Sorry, DB tools only work with MySQL for now.
db_tool.no_choice: Please choose what you want to export.

settings.error1: You have to fill a new password in order to change it.
settings.error2: The two passwords do not match.
settings.error3: Your new password must be at least 4 characters long.
settings.error4: Your old password is not valid.

button.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this record?

create.failure: Error ! No data registered. May ask to your administrator.

update.failure: Error ! No data modified. May ask to your administrator.

delete.failure: Error ! No data deleted. May ask to your administrator.
delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete this entity ?

message.relatedtomanycheckbox_required: A field requires you to check at least one checkbox.

local_file_storage.required_file: Some file / image upload fields are required, please fill them.

agenda.fill_title: Please fill the title event input.
agenda.start_date: Please fill the start date before.
agenda.start_after_end: The start date is after the end date, please fix it.
agenda.end_before_start: The end date is before the start date, please fix it.

validation.float: Field %s must be a floating number
validation.boolean: Field %s must be a true or false
validation.password: Field %s must be between 3 and 32 characters

404.title: We could not find what you were looking for.
404.textone: The link you followed may be incorrect or the page may have been deleted.

500.title: We are sorry, an internal serveur error occured.

error.title: Error
error.goHome: If you wish to return to the homepage, click here
error.goBack: If you want to go back, click here
error.valueTooLong: The given value is too long (>30).
